name: Pinpouin le Ninja
description:
Belly-sliding penguin simulator, with a hook !

Enjoy the ride down following the curves or drop down heavy tricks on big airtime as the penguin you are deep down inside you !

Free your Pinpouin vibes without any constrain with this chill game.


Ah also, Pinpouin never surrenders, but he never learned how to fly either.

Control:

Play the tutorial !

Escape - Pause

Credits :
